Active Skill.Name: Conquest
Active Skill.Description: Reduces the Physical Damage inflicted on your front row troop by 9%/12%/15%/18%/21%/24%/27%/30%, and when they are targeted by Normal attacks, there's a 65% chance of inflicting Physical Damage on the enemy (Damage Rate 30%/40%/50%/60%/70%/80%/90%/100%) for 12s.
